metadata.title: Chunk 3: CRM Portal
metadata.description: Verify the ticket in the CRM portal

steps.narration: Every automated resolution needs to be verifiable. The CRM is the system of record where agents, supervisors, and compliance teams audit what happened.
This ticket was created mid-conversation, before the resolution was even determined. Even if the AI had needed to escalate to a human agent, the full context and history would already be here.

Every field was populated by the AI workflow — no manual data entry, no copy-paste from chat logs. Classification confidence, resolution rationale, and the full conversation transcript are all attached.

Compliance teams can verify exactly what the customer was told and confirm it matches the resolution applied. Same audit trail whether the interaction came through Telegram, WhatsApp, IVR, or any other channel.
Sixty seconds from first message to resolved ticket. Scale this across thousands of daily interactions — that's the operational impact. No hold time, no transfers, no manual ticket creation.
